attributes.action: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to Give newly qualified radiographers jobs! - the NHS is understaffed, particularly in diagnostics - we want to work! give us the oppertunity
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Many govermental targets are increasing the workload for diagnostics. Radiographers play a key part in this yet there are minimal jobs for those qualifying in the foreseeable future due to NHS debt. Many of us want the opportunity to work and the NHS have already paid for many of our fees to train. Give us the jobs so that we have the ability to work and put this training to use for the people of the UK!
